Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers will need their top three players, Ohtani, Betts, and Freeman, to rise to the moment if they want to prevent their division rival from sending them packing for the second time in three years.
The Padres' offence will continue to click in the wild-card round, led by Fernando Tatis Jr. and supported by Kyle Higashioka.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will be the third post-season matchup between the two clubs in the past five years.
The Padres won the season series, 8-5, outscoring the Dodgers 62-56.
The Dodgers handled business against the Padres in the last week of September to lock up the NL West title.
Others: The Dodgers' starting pitching ranked 19th in MLB with a 4.23 ERA for the entirety of the 2024 season.
Freeman's status could be cause for concern if his ankle sprain limits or forces him to miss time in the series.
